function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through connected health care devices","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection and maintenance of devices, implementation of infection control protocols","Technologies":"UV sterilization, antimicrobial materials for device construction","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, community members","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, device manufacturers, urban management authorities"}]}
